Articles.Content:
[sorry for my english, thats not my primary language]

I have a dream, that someday there will be possible launching hubble telescope-replica in Kerbin Shuttle Orbiter System, docking it with mechanical arms to liquid hydrogen powered VASIMIR engine-ship to launch it to very far gas giant, finish estabilishing remote radio communication satellite system there, and deploy to self-sustainable, working colony(survivable?) curiosity-like rover using lithobraking with inflatable airbag triple parachutes, on oxygen moon. And everything on bug-free afternoon.

Wait, that's totally posible to do, with good computer, some KSP experience, 64-bit linux (windows maybe?) and lots, lots of mods. Good work, both Squad and modders.
Unfortunately all I have to add to this thread is that VASIMR is powered using electricity and plasma, but theoretically usually argon or xenon.

sounds fun; mabye take Kethane, Damned robotics (or something slightly more up-to-date), that communications mod, and a space shuttle mod... IDK there's probably enough mods to do it, what do I know I play stock
Lets agree that there is a Mod for every dream you can dream in this game!

Lets agree that there is a Mod for every dream you can dream in this game!

Since they added destructible buildings I've been dreaming of nukes...

Lets agree that there is a Mod for every dream you can dream in this game!

Thats what I was talking about. If you would download every planet pack for planet factory, you could have easily 20 planets on kerbin + their moons + about five additional stars + their planets + asteroids. Kerbal Space Program would be ten times better if 64 bit windows version of the game wouldn't be this bugged.
